content: a free version of this pattern can be found on my blog here 1 chunky moss-stitched coziness a wide ribbed collar and perfect inset pockets - what more could you want in a cardigan the cliffside cardigan is the ultimate fall/winter sweater and perfect for layering over any outfit whether you re battling the ocean breeze or strolling the city streets shop the full kit here 2 **sizes** xs/s m/l xl/xxl pictured in a size xs/s **finished dimensions** width across back 21 /53cm xs/s 24 /61cm m/l 28 /71cm xl/xxl length 23 /58cm xs/s0 24 5 /62cm m/l 26 5 /67cm xl/xxl sleeve length 18 /46cm xs/s 18 5 /47cm m/l xl/xxl **difficulty level** easy **skills** the stockinette stitch rib stitch moss stitch k2tog and ssk decreases seaming picking up stitches all patterns are written in standard us terms sign up for info on special offers sales and new pattern releases bit ly/townewsletter **connect** instagram @twoofwands facebook facebook com/twoofwands pinterest pinterest com/twoofwandsknits youtube youtube com/twoofwandsknits **help** join the crew of wands facebook group 3 to connect with other makers of two of wands patterns for help with techniques and pattern related questions **selling finished items** small batch sales of finished pieces made from this pattern are permitted but seller must use their own photographs and credit must be given to two of wands as the designer the pattern and photographs of this design are the property of two of wands and are for personal non-commercial use only these files are protected by us copyright and you may not distribute or sell them electronically or physically 1 https //www twoofwands com/blog/cliffside-cardigan 2 https //bit ly/cliffsidecardigankit 3 https //www facebook com/groups/2228982030505289
